function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Frequent visitation of ugs during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in ugs visitation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased travel to green areas outside residence","category":"Social and cultural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preference for urban parks and crowded cultural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant correlations between travel distance and place of residence","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in visiting behavior during covid-19","category":"Social and cultural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traveling to ugs at varying distances","category":"Social and cultural risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Visiting urban parks and green spaces may lead to the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data cleaning and filtering leading to incorrect analysis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to identify statistical differences in disease prevalence between countries and regions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Language barrier in translation of responses might result in misunderstanding of the intended meaning.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks associated with the collection and storage of open-ended risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data collected through personal and professional networks may not be diverse or representative of the entire population.","category":"Economic
